properties.areaDesc: Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI; Port Sanilac to Port Huron MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 10:08AM EST until January 9 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...During the Gale Warning, expect sustained winds up to
26 knots from the south with gusts up to 34 knots. The largest
significant waves will be 7 feet with a potential maximum wave
height of 10 feet. During the Small Craft Advisory, expect
sustained winds up to 21 knots from the northwest with gusts
up to 29 knots. The largest significant waves will be 4 feet
with a potential maximum wave height of 5 feet.

* WHERE...Harbor Beach to Port Sanilac MI and Port Sanilac to
Port Huron MI.

* WHEN...During the Gale Warning, the maximum winds are expected
around 1 PM EST Thursday with the largest waves expected
around 3 PM EST Thursday. During the Small Craft Advisory, the
maximum winds are expected around 11 AM EST Wednesday with the
largest waves expected around 1 PM EST Wednesday. During the
Gale Watch, the maximum winds are expected around 1 PM EST
Thursday with the largest waves expected around 3 PM EST
Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY
